entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7 except minus 11 inland.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then northeast 30 gusting to 60. Low minus 7 except minus 11 inland. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along the coast in the evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023
